title: sigh companion in fallout 4 compare to fallout 2

embed.description: This is how you get Sulik if your Intelligence is less than 4. First and foremost, you MUST have the $350 before talking to Sulik. Second is that you only got ONE SHOT in getting him. If you do not succeed then it is impossible to recruit him unless if you were to raise your Intelligence greater than 3.

body:
in fallout 4 it feels like the companion are more like a punching bag than any use
I still remember fallout 2, you can literally not fight at all and watch
these guys slide on the floor and all the way out of screen
from sulik's damage

fallout 4 on the other hand {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
